description:
When Bridget Phillipson decided to cancel the Freedom of Speech Act she was breaching a fundamental principle of the English constitution – a minister of the crown cannot defy the will of Parliament.

The post Why I Believe Bridget Phillipson’s Cancellation of the Freedom of Speech Act Was Unlawful appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why I Believe Bridget Phillipson’s Cancellation of the Freedom of Speech Act Was Unlawful

description:
Heart attacks in American young people under 44 years of age have surged an "alarming" 66% since 2020, with experts blaming a sharp rise in myocarditis during the pandemic.

The post Heart Attacks in Young Americans Surge an “Alarming” 66% Since 2020 appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Heart Attacks in Young Americans Surge an “Alarming” 66% Since 2020

description:
The Government has pledged nearly £22bn for carbon capture and storage projects in a move that has united sceptics and alarmists in condemnation of the expensive and unproven technology.

The post Labour Commits £22bn to Carbon Capture and Storage Projects in Move that Unites Sceptics and Alarmists in Condemnation appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour Commits £22bn to Carbon Capture and Storage Projects in Move that Unites Sceptics and Alarmists in Condemnation

description:
The Australian Government's proposed misinformation bill may be "dead in the water" following significant pushback from opposition Senators in the upper house of the federal Parliament, says Frederick Attenborough.

The post Australia’s Misinformation Bill May Be “Dead in the Water” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Australia’s Misinformation Bill May Be “Dead in the Water”

description:
The FDA's emergency approval of the mRNA vaccines required enhanced disclosure in all advertising. But Pfizer and Moderna dodged the rules by failing to state it was unlicensed and had side-effects, Lee Fang discovers.

The post Pfizer and Moderna’s Vaccine Ad Blitz Dodged Transparency Rules by Failing to State it Was Unlicensed and Had Side-Effects appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Pfizer and Moderna’s Vaccine Ad Blitz Dodged Transparency Rules by Failing to State it Was Unlicensed and Had Side-Effects

description:
As Labour prepares to deliver a Net Zero coup de grâce to the industries that made Britain, there are signs of workers beginning to organise their own defence. But alas, it's doomed to fail, says Ben Pile.

The post The New Net Zero Resistance is Doomed to Fail appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The New Net Zero Resistance is Doomed to Fail

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
